mapper.insert: insert into sys_zipcode (zip_code, province_code, city_code, county_code, zipname, valid_flag, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
